definition: to abandon/to let go to waste
to abandon/to relinquish/to discard/to throw away

sentences.english: And people don't abandon it but to reuse it.
sentences.chinese: 人們並沒有荒棄它，而是重新利用。

sentences.english: The former fertile land was deserted by people because of the loss of fertility.
sentences.chinese: 原本肥沃的土地由於失去了肥力被人們荒棄了。
